subject: Golf
United States Women's Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Paul Fusco, the caddie for Sei Young Kim of South Korea, was removed from the site of the United States Women’s Open after he was discovered taking a photo of a document in the U.S.G.A. office.
snippet: Paul Fusco, the caddie for Sei Young Kim of South Korea, was removed from the site of the United States Women’s Open after he was discovered taking a photo of a document in the U.S.G.A. office.
